content_html: Nepali Congress leader Prakashman Singh has stated that there are attempts to weaken the changes and achievements brought by political parties, using the cover of the Jana Andolan movement. Speaking at an event to mark the 28th remembrance day of Ganeshman Singh, he emphasized that it is the responsibility of politic

title: Leader Singh Alerts Against Undermining Democratic Achievements
